English: To restore your wallet in any cases, please back the mnemonic words for this wallet
Chinese: 为了方便你以后恢复此钱包，请备份你的钱包助记词

English: The wallet mnemonic is a 12-bit random word corresponding to the wallet's private key, you can restore your wallet with these words at any time with it
Chinese: 钱包助记词为对应钱包私钥的12位随机单词，使用助记词，您可随时恢复钱包并使用其中资产

English: Please record the following mnemonic words in order and keep them offline. It is recommended to write them on paper and keep it safe
Chinese: 请按顺序记录以下助记词，并离线保存在安全的地方，建议抄写在纸上，并妥善保存

English: Add a password to protect the mnemonic words(Optional)
Chinese: 添加助记词密码保护助记词(可选)

English: If you lost the password, you will not be able to restore your wallet with mnemonic words only, your funds are irrecoverable.
Chinese: 助记词密码如果丢失，仅助记词将无法恢复钱包，资金将无法找回，请妥善保管

English: Select the mnemonic words by the order of your record to ensure your record is correct
Chinese: 请按记录的顺序选择助记词，以确保您的记录是正确的

English: Incorrect Mnemonic Words, please try again
Chinese: 助记词错误，请重新输入

English: Confirmed, do you want to remove your mnemonic words from the app?
Chinese: 确认完成，是否将助记词从应用中移除？

English: This fee is too low, might take long to confirm
Chinese: 费用过低，确认会非常慢

English: Modify the wallet name to distinguis different wallets
Chinese: 修改钱包名称，便于区分不同钱包

English: After adding the password you will be required to enter it to view important information and perform transactions.
Chinese: 添加密码后，在查看助记词等重要信息及转账时将需要此密码确认

English: This operation can not be undone
Before you delete the wallet, make sure you have backed up the mnemonic words, otherwise you will lost your funds
Chinese: 删除之前，请确认你已经备份了钱包助记词，否则钱包内的资金可能永远丢失

English: Are you sure you want to delete this wallet?
Chinese: 确认要删除这个钱包吗？

English: Confirm your transaction password to proceed
Please select currencies for quick switch at Wallet, 5 at most
Chinese: 请勾选在首页可快捷切换的货币，最多可选择5种

English: Add a lock app password, launch the app requires password confirmation, therefore other people will not be able to see your funds freely
Chinese: 添加锁定应用密码后，启动应用需要解锁，其他人将无法随意查看到你的资产

English: To protect your funds, please set a transaction password
Chinese: 为保证您的资金安全，请设置交易密码

English: You have no wallet yet, create a wallet to manage your tokens
Chinese: 还没有钱包，立即创建钱包管理你的虚拟币

English: Password should be 8 characters or more
Network error, check your network and try again
Chinese: 网络错误，请检查网络后重试

English: If you add a password, you will need to use both the mnemonic words and password to restore your wallet
Chinese: 添加密码后，恢复钱包时，必须同时使用助记词和助记词密码

English: By using Asilink, you agree to our {value}
Chinese: 使用Asilink即表示你同意我们的{value}

English: Enter your wallet mnemonic words, separated by space
Chinese: 请输入你的钱包助记词，以空格隔开

English: Name this wallet to distinguish it from other wallet
Chinese: 给这个钱包命名，以便区分不同钱包

English: Update to at least version {value}  to continue use {name} , the current version may cause failures in transactions
Chinese: 请更新到至少版本{value} 以继续使用{name} ，当前版本可能会导致交易失败

English: Skip if you haven't set a password
Are you sure you want to delete this contact?
Chinese: 确认要删除这个联系人吗？

English: Please keep at least one currency
Gas Price too high, better be less than 100 gwei
Chinese: Gas Price太高，建议小于100 gwei

English: Gas Price too low, should be higher than 1 gwei
Chinese: Gas Price太低，建议大于1 gwei

English: This name has been taken by an address, use another one
Chinese: 名称已经用于一个地址，换一个吧

English: Share this invitation code to invite admins
Chinese: 分享邀请码邀请钱包管理员

English: Cancel Invitation will delete this wallet, are you sure?
Chinese: 取消邀请会删除这个钱包，确定要取消吗？

English: Use Asilink to scan the QR code
Chinese: 使用Asilink扫描邀请码二维码

English: Or go to Add Wallet -> Join Shared Wallet -> enter the invitation code
Chinese: 或前往添加钱包->加入共享钱包->输入邀请码

English: The wallet is full, can’t join it anymore.
24 hours has passed, you can now delete the proposal
Chinese: 距离提议创建已经24小时，你现在可以选择删除此提议

English: The transaction has already been broadcasted
Are you sure you want to reject this proposal?
Chinese: 你确认要拒绝此付款提议吗？

English: Delete proposal means cancel this transaction once and for all, are you sure?
Chinese: 删除提议意味着永久取消本次交易，你确认要删除吗？

English: You can delete this proposal before anyone accept it
Chinese: 在有其他管理员同意之前，你可随时删除提议

English: Small dust input in the wallet, not all funds can be sent.
Chinese: 钱包中有少量Dust余额，无法发送所有资金

English: Tap to search and add your favorite assets
Chinese: 点击搜索并添加币种到收藏列表

English: Can’t add more addresses, there are already 20 unused addresses
Chinese: 无法增加更多地址，当前已有20个未使用地址

English: {value} is under maintenance now, please try again after the maintenance
Chinese: {value}正在维护中，请再维护完成后再尝试

English: Server error, please try again later
Chinese: 服务器错误，请稍后重试

English: Request too frequent, please try again later
Chinese: 请求过于频繁，请稍后再试

English: The address you enter does not match selected coin type
Chinese: 您输入的地址与选择的币种不一致

English: Failed to create wallet, please try again
Failed to import wallet, please try again
Failed to establish connection with server, please enter your password to reconnect
Chinese: 与服务端建立连接失败，请输入密码重试
余额不足以支付矿工费

English: Part of your balance has been locked because of transactions in confirmation, please try sending again later
Chinese: 确认中的交易导致部分余额被锁定，请稍后再尝试发送

English: You can also use the following email address to contact us
Chinese: 您可复制下方地址，直接联系我们

English: Please confirm your mnemonic passwords, make sure you will be able to restore this wallet later
Chinese: 请确认你的助记词密码，确保以后能成功恢复钱包

English: The transaction to send {value} is failed, please try again
Chinese: 发送{value}的交易失败，请重试

English: {creator} created a new proposal to send {value} from shared wallet {name}
Chinese: {creator}创建了一个从{name}发送{value}的新提议

English: The corresponding shared wallet already exists, please import in another device
Chinese: 该私钥对应的共享钱包已存在，请换一台设备导入

English: Sending ETH token requires ETH as miner fee, please recharge some ETH first
Chinese: 发送ETH代币需要ETH作为矿工费，请充值一些矿工费之后再转账

English: You have {value} {coin} left, are you sure you want to hide {coin}?
Chinese: 您还有{value} {coin}剩余，确认要隐藏{coin}吗？

English: The address does not match selected coin type
Chinese: 地址与所选币种不匹配

English: The relevant wallet has been deleted by you
Chinese: 相关钱包已被您删除掉

English: A new address has been generated
Turn off Segwit Address in Home -> Me to use normal address
Chinese: 在首页->我的将隔离见证地址关闭，就可以使用常规地址了

English: Turn on Segwit Address in Home -> Me to use Segwit Address
Chinese: 在首页->我的将隔离见证地址开启，就可以使用隔离见证地址了

English: Segwit address saves a certain miner fee in each BTC transaction
Chinese: 使用隔离见证地址能为每一笔BTC交易节省一定矿工费用

English: Asilink does not have access to  your Camera Roll
After turned on, the default receiving address of current wallets and future wallets will be segwit address
Chinese: 开启之后，当前所有钱包以及新建钱包的默认收款地址将使用隔离见证地址

English: No one can access your assets without the private key(mnemonic words)
Chinese: 没有私钥(助记词)，任何人都无法获取您的资产

English: Be sure to back up mnemonic words
Asilink provided four kinds of extra security measures for you to protect assets
Chinese: Asilink为您提供了四种额外的安全措施来保护资产

English: We want Asilink to be a product users really need, and we value every user’s opinion
Chinese: 我们希望Asilink成为用户真正需要的产品，也珍视每个用户的意见

English: Already set as the default receive address
There is no QR code on the picture
Chinese: 图片上没有二维码信息

English: Generate a new address to replace the current one?
Chinese: 要新增地址替换掉当前地址吗？

English: If the backup is skipped and the wallet cannot be restored elsewhere, are you sure to skip?
Chinese: 如果跳过备份，在其它地方无法恢复钱包，确认跳过吗？

English: Request timeout, please try again later
The token contract does not allow this transaction
Chinese: 该代币合约不允许发送该交易

English:
Go to Add wallet > Create Wallet > Name Wallet > Back Up Wallet, click Advanced Options and set a passphrase
With this passphrase, even if someone stolen your mnemonic words, he can not access your asset without the passphrase
Chinese:
进入添加钱包 > 创建钱包 > 命名钱包 > 备份钱包，点击高级选项并设置密码
设置密码后，即使有人偷走了你的私钥，也无法获取你的资金

English: Asilink will support Trezor and Ledger on desktop, please visit our website www.Asilink.com and download desktop Asilink when available
Chinese: Asilink桌面端将支持Trezor和Ledger两种硬件钱包，后续您可访问我们的网站 www.Asilink.com 下载Asilink桌面端

English:
Multi-sig wallet has several private keys, it spares risks
Go to Add wallet > Create shared wallet, and ask your friends to join your wallet
Chinese:
多签钱包拥有多个私钥，可以分散资金风险
进入添加钱包 > 创建钱包，然后邀请您的朋友加入钱包

English: {value} would like to access your wallet addresses
Chinese: {value}想要获取权限读取钱包地址

English: For more Tokens, please search directly
Connecting to the hardware, please wait…
Please turn on your cellphone blue-teeth in settings
Chinese: 请在设置中打开手机蓝牙

English: Turn on Blueteeth on your phone
Chinese: 在手机上打开蓝牙功能

English: Go to  Blueteeth on your hardware
Chinese: 进入硬件钱包的蓝牙连接界面

English: Scan the QR Code to connect
Scan the QR code on your hardware wallet
Chinese: 请扫描硬件钱包上的二维码

English: Please turn on your cellphone blue-teeth and hardware wallet
Chinese: 请启动手机蓝牙以及硬件钱包

English: Please confirm the transaction on your hardware wallet
Chinese: 请在硬件钱包上点击确认交易

English: The hardware rejected the transaction, please try again
Chinese: 硬件拒绝签名交易，请重试
交易已成功发送，等待确认

English: The address of the Ethereum applies to all Ethereum tokens
Chinese: 以太币的地址适用于所有以太坊代币

English: Failed to connect, please try again
You have the absolute control of your assets
Chinese: 您可以完全掌控自己的资产

English: To ensure the security of your funds, please set a password to protect your account and assets
Chinese: 为保证您的资金安全，请设置密码用于保护您的账号和资产

English: To ensure the security of your funds, please set a password
Chinese: 为保证您的资金安全，请设置密码

English: Please enter your wallet mnemonic, mnemonic words need to be separated by a single space
Chinese: 请输入你的钱包助记词，助记词需要以单个空格隔开

English: Please enter or paste your private key
Chinese: 请输入或粘贴你的私钥

English: Are you sure you want to hide {value}?

Chinese: 输入数据(十六进制数据)

English: Please check and confirm the following transaction
Chinese: 请检查并确认以下交易

English: {value} wants to read your wallet address, please confirm whether to authorize it?
Chinese: {value} 想要读取您的钱包地址，是否授权给对方？

English: Verify your password before viewing the mnemonic
Chinese: 查看助记词之前，请先验证您的密码

English: Please enter your wallet password before deleting your wallet
Chinese: 删除钱包前，请输入您的钱包密码

English: Please enter your password to log into current account
Chinese: 请验证密码登录当前账号

English: Use mnemonic words to log in
The format of private key is not correct.It should be like this:0x.....
Chinese: 私钥格式错误，正确的格式应为：0x……

English: Incorrect transaction type, please select again
Chinese: 交易类型错误，请重新选择

English: The name can’t contain space, please re-enter
Chinese: 名称包含空格，请重新输入

English: This wallet is imported using mnemonics, it has no private key
Chinese: 该钱包是从私钥导入，没有助记词！

English: this rpc address is already exist
Select asset and enter amount then confirm this transaction
Chinese: 选择币种并输入金额后确认此交易

English: No private key has been added
